page.title: 13Domestic Pets.
page.content: At our school the most popular pet is the gold fish.Dogs and cats are also popular. Three people have budgerigars and one person has a guinea pig. Recently two of the children got two gerbils as pets and brought them to school for us to see.One child's father has a pet rat.My pet is a cavalier King Charles'spaniel.I call him Jody.He is tall for his age,thirty eight centimetres high, though he is only two years old.When I get home from school I get changed, have my tea and then go out to play. Then I take my dog for a walk. I also have four gold fish which I feed each day. If you want to buy a pet you have to go to Carlisle as there are no pet shops in Fletchertown.I used to have some rabbits as pets.I play with Jody until 20.00 hours then I watch television and go to bed at about 22.00 hours.
